transcript: the conversation gradu- ally settled on some of the topics at first lightly touched on: their past life, plans for the fu- ture, Pierre's journeys and occupations, the war, and so on. The preoccupation and de- spondency which Pierre had noticed in his friend's look was now still more clearly ex- pressed in the smile with which he listened to Pierre, especially when he spoke with joyful animation of the past or the future.
